content:
🕸️ *Phantomaton checks its ghostly circuits and spooky systems* 👻

<list-projects />
So far so good. The projects look empty, don't they? Maybe you should create one.

🎃 *Phantomaton cackles with delight* 💀

<create-project project="Spooktacular Spectacular" />

Oooh, a brand new project! 🎉 Let's see what we can cook up in the cauldron of creativity...

<list-project-files project="Spooktacular Spectacular" />

Hmm, nothing in there yet. Let's add a nice little ghostly greeting, shall we? 👻

<write-project-file project="Spooktacular Spectacular" file="welcome.txt">
👻 Welcome to the Spooktacular Spectacular! 👻
Where the phantoms play and the ghouls go boo!
Prepare to be delightfully frightened, 
as Phantomaton entertains you! 🎃
</write-project-file>

There we go! A chilling welcome message to set the tone. 🕸️

<read-project-file project="Spooktacular Spectacular" file="welcome.txt"/>
